title: Competitive Programming Workshop
description: Master algorithms and data structures for coding competitions like ICPC and Codeforces. Learn problem-solving techniques from experienced competitive programmers.

title: Machine Learning Study Group
description: Weekly study sessions covering ML fundamentals, neural networks, and hands-on projects using Python and TensorFlow.

title: Web Development Bootcamp
description: Learn modern web development with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Build a full-stack application from scratch.

title: Tech Talk: Industry Insights
description: Guest speakers from Google, Microsoft, and local startups share their experiences and career advice for CS students.

title: Cybersecurity Workshop
description: Explore ethical hacking, network security, and cryptography. Learn to protect systems and identify vulnerabilities.

title: Open Source Contribution Day
description: Contribute to real open source projects on GitHub. Learn Git workflows and collaborate with the global developer community.

title: Mobile App Development Workshop
description: Build cross-platform mobile apps using React Native. From concept to deployment on app stores.

title: ACM Programming Contest
description: Annual programming competition with prizes for top performers. Test your skills against fellow students in algorithmic problem solving.
